about_the_game:
BoomSheets™ is an animation tool used by gamedevs of all levels from noob to pro! Use the magic wand tool to select frames automatically and apply attributes to frames to run as custom code in your game engine of choice! Click, click, and boom- done! It's that easy!

The (.anim) animation file format is a text-editor, friendly, file format for 2D animations using a source texture (aka atlas or spritesheet). It is human-readable so quick edits do not require long boot-up times and the official animation format used by the Blast Game Engine™. Unlike other animation programs that overwhelm the user with proprietary file formats, too many features to choose from, and a steep learning curve, BoomSheets™ is the ultimate tool for a free-to-use file format that lets you focus entirely on animating and integrating swiftly into your game! Why spend hours learning how to use other graphic editors when you can start animating within seconds!

BoomSheets™ also comes with configurable programmer-friendly options like streaming your animation directly to your game to see instant updates!

What's not to love? Start with BoomSheets™ and start making animations today!
